properties.entry: select i.instance_id, j.judgement_id, i.train, d.disease_id, f.fold, f.run from cv_fold f inner join cv_fold_instance i on f.cv_fold_id = i.cv_fold_id inner join i2b2_2008_anno a on a.disease = f.label and a.docId = i.instance_id and a.source = 'intuitive' inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = a.disease inner join i2b2_2008_judgement j on j.judgement = a.judgement left join hotspot_zero_vector hzv on hzv.instance_id = i.instance_id and hzv.label = a.disease and hzv.cutoff = @export.cutoff@ and hzv.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and hzv.experiment = 'ontocuis' where hzv.hotspot_zero_vector_id is null and f.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008'

select s.*, 1 from ( select i.instance_id, h.feature_name from hotspot_instance i inner join hotspot_feature_eval h on i.hotspot_instance_id = h.hotspot_instance_id and h.evaluation >= @export.cutoff@ inner join i2b2_2008_disease d on d.disease = i.label where d.disease_id = :label and i.corpus_name = 'i2b2.2008' and i.experiment = 'ontocuis' ) s
